item.title: Two Steps to Build a Academic Website with Hugo and Wowchemy
item.description: Four days ago, I got a requirement to build a academic website for yunzila~. This reminds me of my previous blog experience. Since my blog is built with Hugo, I started to find an academic theme which is designed for Hugo. Here is a link to Hugo themes, and then I find the Academic theme developed by gcushen which meets my needs.
